comments:
In a HOT, i'd like to generate an empty Map Expression in a binding statement of an action block. It was working 3 weeks ago but now, it throws me this exception: 
org.atl.engine.extractors.ebnf.EBNFExtractionException: cannot find mathing template for: MapExp (full stack trace below).

My code is very simple:

stmt1 : ATL!BindingStat (
  source <- stmt1_source,
  value <- mapInit
),
mapInit : ATL!MapExp (
  elements <- Sequence{}
)

As i launch ADT's stuff in a separate workbench, my first eclipse workbench (the one lauching the other with ADT) displays this stack trace in the console:

org.atl.engine.extractors.ebnf.EBNFExtractionException: cannot find mathing template for: MapExp
